Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Reroute at Foster/Elston
ShortDescription: 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Central, Bryn Mawr, Elston, then resume their normal route.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Central, Bryn Mawr, Elston, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage at Foster/Elston.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rdTemporary Reroute at 63rd/Sacramento
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, California, 59th, Kedzie, then resume their normal route on 63rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, California, 59th, Kedzie, then resume their normal route on 63rd, due to fire department activity at 63rd/Sacramento.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rdTemporary Reroute at 63rd/Sacramento
